title: Patrick Barul
text:
Patrick Barul (born 2 October 1977 in <a href="Orl%C3%A9ans">Orléans</a>) is a French former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who played for French team <a href="OGC%20Nice">OGC Nice</a>.
Barul was out of contract in June 2009 <a href="https%3A//web.archive.org/web/20081122020601/http%3A//www.ogcnice.com/equipes/joueur.php%3Fid%3D30"></a>, but in December 2009 moved to Belgium and joined <a href="RFC%20Tournai">RFC Tournai</a>.
Honours.
Lens
